page.title: 02Going to school.
page.content: I bike to school. Some boys and girls go on the bus. We play outside till somebody rings the bell.Then we go inside and do our spellings.Then we go into the hall for assembly. We sing two songs and sometimes we have a story and some prayers.Then we go into the classroom. We do some maths until playtime.Sometimes we do art or do something outside or go for a walk. Sometimes we go for a bike ride.Then we have playtime.After playtime we read or we play a game of rounders or we are read to. Then it is time to go home.The bus comes and all the cars come and the chilren come out.
